wordGroup: nutritional supplement 营养补充品；营养增补剂

sentences.en: Both provide intensive coaching, training facilities and nutritional advice.
sentences.cn: 两者都提供强化训练、培训设施和营养建议。

sentences.en: They get all their nutritional needs met by the genes that they've hijacked from the algae.
sentences.cn: 它们从藻类植物那里劫持来的基因满足了它们所有的营养需求。

sentences.en: One reason may be breakfast's nutritional value—partly because cereal is fortified with vitamins.
sentences.cn: 早餐有营养价值的原因之一可能是——谷物富含维生素。
